intro.description: This cheat sheet helps you to create an entity service. First you start with creating a project

item.title: Create Project
item.description: Use the following embedded command to open the Create Project Wizard

item.title: Create Data Structure for the Entity Service
item.description: Next is creating of domain model object. Follow the Create Data Structure Wizard and create a table with a single primary key of type integer

item.title: Activate Project
item.description: Select the target project with right-click and select Activate command. This will create the actual table from the just created definition

item.title: Generate JavaScript Service for the target Data Structure
item.description: Select the Entity Service on Table template from the JavaScript Service Wizard and select the table just created

item.title: Generate User Interface on the Entity file
item.description: Select the just generated *.entity file with right-click select the Generate->User Interface for Entity Service command from the popup-menu

item.title: Activate Project
item.description: Select the target project with right-click and select Activate command

item.title: Test the Result
item.description: Select the generated *.html file under WebContent folder and view the result at Preview
